DOC.brief_summary: This study will test two different formulations. The results will be used to select formulation for phase 3.
DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability Study Of PF-00868554 Administered As 3x250mg Oral Tablets (Wet Granulate, 3x250mg Oral Tablets (Dry Granulate) And 750mg Solution Under Fed State
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteers. Standard for healthy volunteers.
